subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Cappie Pondexter and the finals M.V.P. Diana Taurasi combined for 50 points in Game 5 as Phoenix won its second W.N.B.A. title in three years.
snippet: Cappie Pondexter and the finals M.V.P. Diana Taurasi combined for 50 points in Game 5 as Phoenix won its second W.N.B.A. title in three years.
